Instruction: Cut the bell peppers into quarters and remove the seeds and membranes.
In a bowl, mix olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
Toss the bell pepper quarters in the olive oil mixture until evenly coated.
Arrange the bell pepper quarters on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until peppers are tender and slightly charred.
Remove from the oven and serve as a delicious side dish.
